Mon, 22 Jun 2009 14:36:35 +0000 
Normal 
6.19.09 Cover Letter toMlem
DF; 6.19.09_Letter_to.PDF; 
Exhibits_to_6.19.095etter_t .PDF 
I received all of these from Jay. Apparently a 3-ring binder was fed exed to WPB and arrived this morning. It 
contains these three documents (the Exhibits attachment is 135 pages long). 
Aahhh, summer associate season at Kirkland and Ellis. I will review and get back to you. 
Assistant U.S. Attorney 
Southern District of Florida 
500 East Broward Boulevard, 
Ft. Lauderdale, FL 33394 
Fax
From: Jay Leflowit [mailto 
Sent: Friday, June 19, 2009 6:36 PM 
To: 
Subject: Response Letters 
Dear 
Attached please find letters and exhibits responding to your two recent letters. 
I 
hope we can speak next week. 
Best. Jay 
The information contained in 
this communication is 
confidential, may be attorney-client 
privileged, may 
constitute inside information, and is 
intended only for 
the use of the addressee. It is the property of 
Kirkland & Ellis LLP or Kirkland & Ellis International LLP. 
Unauthorized use, disclosure or copying of this 
communication or any part thereof is strictly prohibited 
and may be unlawful. If you have received this 
communication 
in error, please notify us immediately by 
return e-mail or by 
e-mail to postmaster@kirkland.com, and 
destroy this communication and all copies 
thereof, 
EFTA00013853

including 
all attachments. 
EFTA00013854
